snippet: A judge said Pfc. Bradley Manning’s trial would be postponed until at least June 3 to allow consideration of classified information.
abstract: Military judge says Pfc Bradley Manning’s trial on charges of leaking confidential documents to Wikileaks will be postponed until at least June 3 to allow consideration of classified information that may be used.
lead_paragraph: A judge said Pfc. Bradley Manning’s trial would be postponed until at least June 3 to allow consideration of classified information.

headline.seo: New Evidence to Be Introduced Against Bradley Manning
headline.main: New Evidence Expected in WikiLeaks Case
headline.print_headline: New Evidence Expected in WikiLeaks Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
